HWindowView

HWindowView has no logic functionality at except basic View management inherited from HView.

Its sole purpose is to act as a themeable background for the content area of windows.  Use HWindowControl as the interface, don’t use the HWindowView directly.

Summary
HWindowView
HWindowView has no logic functionality at except basic View management inherited from HView.
Instance variables
constructor
Basically just a passthrough for HView.constructor it only differs by defining theme preservation and the instance type.
draw
Nothing special, gets drawn by HWindowControl

HView

NOTE

HWindow -components are still evolving.

Nothing special, gets drawn by HWindowControl

Abstract foundation class for all visual components.
constructor: function(_rect,
_parentClass)
Basically just a passthrough for HView.constructor it only differs by defining theme preservation and the instance type.
constructor: function(_rect,
_parentClass)
Constructs the logic part of a HView.
draw: function()
Nothing special, gets drawn by HWindowControl
HWindowControl (with alias HWindow) is the main component of the HWindow classes.
HWindowLabel responds to drag passthrough drag events and is responsible for displaying the label of the HWindowBar.
HWindowBar responds to drag passthrough drag events and is responsible for displaying the HWindowLabel and misc window header stuff, like close, zoom and minimize buttons.
